alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 6:49PM CDT until May 24 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... Eastern Newton County in southeastern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 648 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sugartown to Tulla to near Bancroft, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Rosepine, Merryville, Anacoco, Singer, Fort Polk, Sugartown, Slagle, Toledo Bend Dam, Fields, Bon Weir, Pitkin, Burkeville, New Llano, Hornbeck, Bivens, Hutton, Kurthwood and Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
